title: Handwriting / Font - Suggestions?
content:
Handwriting / Font - Suggestions?  
Any suggestions for a font which is - some kind of similar - to this handwriting? Suggestions and help is highly appreciated.  
We need it for the translation of a bookproject with not enough budget to create a new font out of these characters.  
Thanks.  
Mark

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415064359im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Font_4087)
author: Novotypo

comments.content: Can't state if it's handwritten or a heavily use of stylistic alternates. Without too much thinking, I'd say "all repeating letters are different so handwritten". Anyway, here are some in the same vein: [Memoir](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415064359/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/stephen-rapp/memoir) (very close to this one), [Liana](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415064359/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/liana), [Voluta Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415064359/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/voluta-script), [Memory](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415064359/http:/misstiina.com/fonts/mtf-memory), [Gemmadonati](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415064359/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/eurotypo/gemmadonati)

Thank you. Your suggestions were very helpful. Memoir will do the job.  
best, Mark
